name: My Lil Plant
description:
Basic drag and drop game. Drag the items to the flowerpot and wait for the plant to grow. Items have to be given in the right order or it wont work. 

P.S: you have to wait about 1 minute for it to fully grow after you put sunlight in it.

This is the first project that I have fully completed and can say that I am satisfied with the final project. I am not good at drawing so sorry for the lack of flowers on the plant. It is the first time I have used particle systems and audio sources in unity so its not perfect but hope you enjoy.
